prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Strings, Guitar, Bass, Drums, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Strings, Guitar, Bass, and Drums, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Strings, Guitar, Bass, and Drums, Piano excluded.

Style 3:
No Piano is included in this song, which is made up of Strings, Guitar, Bass, and Drums.
